aEP_MagicBounty1.job_description: An urgent bounty issued by the FSF Hidden Factory, targeting the complete eradication of a fleet under the control of the remnants. This fleet was originally a test fleet for an advanced weapons program, planned to engage a small combat group of remnant in a controlled environment, to test the combat effectiveness of the 'Redtide-class dreadnought modernization project' in actual combat. However, there was a serious situation; the remnant mothership significantly raised the level of countermeasures for this battle and dispatched several fleets including main forces to completely cut off our contact with that fleet. According to current communication monitoring, although it has been confirmed that all members of the fleet have been killed, messages like combat orders are still being transmitted between the ships, as if they are still fighting against remnant, which is truly eerie. The mission objective is to eliminate the lost test fleet
aEP_MagicBounty1.job_comm_reply: Human...Battle...Mission...Are you coming to help us...Aaaahhhh
aEP_MagicBounty1.job_intel_success: The target fleet appears to be completely taken over by the remnants. After destroying these constantly reconstructing ghost ships, you reported this information.
aEP_MagicBounty1.job_intel_failure: After countless reconstructions, you no longer have the strength to continue fighting.
aEP_MagicBounty1.job_intel_expired: The target fleet has lost its signal, seemingly using the transverse jump device on the ships to enter hyperspace, making it untraceable.
aEP_MagicBounty1.job_difficultyDescription: If you don't want to join them, it's best to be prepared. The target fleet has 1-2 capital ships.
